data.name: Feedback.Button.Technical.Hover
data.value: Technical feedback - Opens a browser window

data.name: Feedback.Button.UX.Hover
data.value: User experience feedback - Opens a browser window

data.name: MudPopover.Feedback.Final.Hover
data.value: Final feedback - Opens a browser window

data.name: MudPopover.Feedback.Survey.Text
data.value: In order to further develop and optimize the authoring tool, we would appreciate if you could take a few minutes to give us feedback on the current status of the authoring tool.

data.name: Export.SnackBar.Message
data.value: Publishing of the learning world completed.

data.name: ErrorString.Missing.LearningSpace.Message
data.value: Learning world contains no learning spaces.

data.name: ErrorString.Missing.LearningElements.Message
data.value: Learning space {0} contains no learning elements.

data.name: ErrorString.Insufficient.Points.Message
data.value: Learning space {0} cannot be completed due to insufficient points. Currently, the points required are higher than the total points.

data.name: Dialog.NotLoggedIn.Message
data.value: You are not connected to a LMS. Please login to upload your learning worlds to the backend.

data.name: Dialog.UploadLearningWorld.DialogText
data.value: Do you want to upload the learning world {0}?

data.name: ErrorString.TaskReferencesUnplacedElement.Message
data.value: Element {0} references an element which was not placed inside of a space.

data.name: ErrorString.TaskReferencesNonexistantElement.Message
data.value: Element {0} contains a reference to a non-existant element. Plase check the element references you have set in this element.

data.name: ErrorString.TaskReferencesElementInSpaceAfterOwnSpace.Message
data.value: Element {0} references element {2} in space {1}. However, because this space comes after the space in which element {0} is placed, this reference is invalid.

data.name: UploadLearningWorld.Success.DialogText
data.value: Your learning world {0} was successfully uploaded. Click here, to open the world in moodle or here, to go to the 3D website.

data.name: ExportArchive.Hover
data.value: Archive the learning world as ZIP file (e.g. to send to another computer or as a backup)

data.name: LearningOutcomes.Overview
data.value: Learning outcomes of this learning world
